<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Attach files to the entity"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/{entityType:(contact|opportunity|case)}/{entityid:[0-9]+}/files"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Attaches the selected file(s) to the entity specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"entityType":{"description":"Entity type","type":"string"},"entityid":{"description":"Entity ID","type":"integer"},"fileids":{"description":"List of file IDs","type":"array","items":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
